channel.title: wifi on 白天’s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in wifi on 白天’s Blog

item.title: freebsd无线配置静态ip
item.description: 修改 /etc/rc.conf 写入 静态ip wlans_ath0="wlan0" ifconfig_wlan0="WPA inet 192.168.1.100 netmask 255.255.255.0" dhcp 获取 wlans_ath0="wlan0" ifconfig_wlan0="WPA DHCP" wpa 配置 /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf network={ ssid="YourAPssid" psk="YourAPpassword" } 完成，可以上网喽
